snippet: Russian officials slammed a decision to ban clubs from the annexed peninsula of Crimea from playing in Russian leagues, calling it “inexplicable.”
abstract: Russian sports officials slam decision by Union of European Football Associations to ban soccer clubs from annexed peninsula of Crimea from playing in Russian leagues.
lead_paragraph: Russian officials slammed a decision to ban clubs from the annexed peninsula of Crimea from playing in Russian leagues, calling it “inexplicable.”

headline.main: Russia Criticizes UEFA Decision Barring Crimean Soccer Clubs
